creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage; face, PL shoulder, and hand of older man at left, looking toward PL, holding a doughnut-shaped piece of cereal, wearing a yellow shirt and purple plaid jacket; ruined orange partial car body at center, with debris spilling out, with other cars in background, and pinkish-purple brick wall at left; squatting man in profile at right wearing orange pants, purple plaid jacket, purple glasses, and yellow striped shirt, looking down; received in blue frame
signed: LLC in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 The Invention of the Wheel
title: The Invention of the Wheel
